name: DarkWorld (Excvazar Games)
description:
The doomsday has begun, and the old gods awaken. The world is in need of a hero, but nobody is there to save them, everyone is by themselves. You play as a demigod, who was born with dark powers, who becomes stronger by consuming the powers of others. Now it is time to prove yourself worthy of this world, and you may be able to save it. 

Remeber!

The game is still not complete
